document_data.name: Palace Guard of Huzuz
document_data.mainbody: The '''Palace Guard of Huzuz''' served as within the [[Palace of the Enlightened Throne]] in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Organization:
All members of the palace guard were large individuals who possessed not only intimidating physical strength and presence, but enough intelligence and eloquence to resort to politely addressing visitors. They also possessed an eye for spotting potential trouble or anything that was out of place.

There were 1,000 members of the guard.
document_data.Base of Operations: The palace guard was active within the royal palace of Huzuz.
document_data.Members: Prince [[Cheddah al-Assad]] was the ultimate commander of the palace guard.
